job_tasks.phrase: Lead the development and integration of AI and ML technologies within our flagship product, ensuring technical excellence and innovation.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes leading the development and integration of technologies into a product, which aligns with the definition of traditional software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure the infrastructure supporting AI and ML operations is robust, secure, and capable of scaling with the company's growth.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on the robustness, security, and scalability of infrastructure, which are core software engineering concerns, even when supporting AI/ML operations.

job_tasks.justification: Developing and exposing functionalities via APIs is a standard software development and integration task.

job_tasks.justification: Translating business needs into technical solutions and collaborating with other teams is a fundamental software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions designing and implementing ML models and LLM solutions, which falls under model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Oversee the entire AI lifecycle, including data collection, model training, evaluation, and deployment of our LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: Overseeing the AI lifecycle, including training and evaluation of LLMs, is a core task in model development and management.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay abreast of the latest AI/ML advancements and incorporate cutting-edge technologies to maintain our competitive edge.
job_tasks.justification: This involves research and adoption of new AI/ML technologies, fitting into the model development and fine-tuning category.

job_tasks.phrase: driving the development and implementation of AI-driven solutions within our flagship product. This role encompasses a broad range of responsibilities, from chatbot creation to training and hosting large language models.
job_tasks.justification: Chatbot creation and working with LLMs implies tasks related to prompt engineering and potentially RAG, especially when integrating them into a product.

job_tasks.phrase: address the complex needs of integrating LLMs, ensuring a seamless and effective deployment.
job_tasks.justification: Integrating LLMs into products often involves prompt engineering and ensuring their effective deployment, which aligns with this category.
Data collection is a fundamental part of the data engineering and management process for AI/ML models.

profile.rationale: The role involves a significant amount of both core software engineering tasks (leading development, integration, infrastructure, APIs) and AI specialization tasks focused on Generative AI (LLM solutions, chatbot creation, training/hosting LLMs, integrating LLMs). The emphasis on LLMs and chatbots, alongside traditional ML, points towards a Core GenAI Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and detailed, explicitly mentioning responsibilities that map directly to both core software engineering and GenAI specialization tasks. The distinction between traditional ML and LLM/chatbot work is also evident, allowing for a confident profile assignment.
